Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Hillborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillborough Way and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Hillborough Way runs west out the intersection with Leviathan Drive, which runs north and south. Hillborough runs between a number of the small shopping centers in the center of Oceancrest. Leviathan Drive runs all the way from the north city walls in the northern end of the city to the south city walls in the southern end. It is one of the longest streets in Oceancrest.
